original_text: After Paul said this, he took some bread in his hands. He stood in front of them all and he thanked God for the bread. Then he broke the bread into pieces and he began to eat it.
korean_text: 떡을 가져다가 모든 사람 앞에서 하나님께 축사하고 떼어 먹기를 시작하매

sentences.original_text: he took some bread in his hands
He stood in front of them all
and he thanked God for the bread
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그는 빵에 대해 하나님께 감사했다

sentences.original_text: Then he broke the bread into pieces
sentences.korean_translation: 그러고 나서 그는 빵을 조각으로 나누었다

sentences.original_text: and he began to eat it
